tree.name: Andrew Wiggins
tree.tradeDescription: Part of 5-team Jimmy Butler trade. MIA received Wiggins, PJ Tucker, and GSW 2025 1st round pick (top-10 protected)
tree.note: Acquired from Golden State in 5-team trade involving MIA, GSW, DET, UTA, TOR

assetsGivenUp.name: Jimmy Butler
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 4-team sign-and-trade. MIA received Butler and Meyers Leonard. PHI received Josh Richardson. POR received Hassan Whiteside. LAC received Maurice Harkless and a future 1st round pick.
assetsGivenUp.note: Sign-and-trade with Philadelphia, Portland, and LA Clippers

assetsGivenUp.name: Josh Richardson
assetsGivenUp.note: Sent to PHI. Undrafted by MIA, signed 2015

assetsGivenUp.name: Hassan Whiteside
assetsGivenUp.note: Sent to POR. Signed as free agent by MIA in 2014

assetsGivenUp.name: Maurice Harkless
assetsGivenUp.note: Sent to LAC with a future 1st round pick
